headline: Occidental announces offer to exercise warrants at temporarily reduced price
summary: Occidental announced an offer to exercise its outstanding publicly traded warrants at a temporarily reduced price. The Offer is available to holders of the Warrants, each representing the right to purchase one share of Occidental’s common stock, $0.20 par value per share, at an exercise price of $22.00. The Warrants were initially distributed by Occidental on August 3, 2020 in the form of a dividend to the holders of record of Occidental’s common stock as of July 6, 2020 and are listed on the Ne
